"flare craft" are actually ground-effect vehicles, or "Cushion-craft"...  they depend on a large, semi-stable cushion of air, under the body of the vehicle, generated by a large wing.  The vehicle "rides" on the cushion, anything up to 10 ft off the surface and needs very little energy to keep it up there, once it's established, so they could be a very efficint means of transport if developed for other than military means - they're mainly seen in an anti-submarine role in Eastern Eruope, last time I heard
